content:
Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft spruce_pressure_plate I need to first craft spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted from stripped_spruce_wood, which is located in slot 37. Therefore, I will move the stripped_spruce_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: The spruce_planks have been crafted. I will move them to the inventory so they can be used later.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a spruce_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 spruce_planks in the crafting table. There are 4 spruce_planks available at slot 11, so I will start by moving one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I have already placed one spruce_planks in the crafting table, so now I will place another one next to it.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 39, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "command_block_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
